name: Alien Joint
description:
[[ Hello! this is my first ever game jam! 

I couldn't have time to add some music :(

But at least I finished it!! yeah ]]

This game is an adventure game where you have to sort  dangerous path through the Solar System and then defeat the differents alien kings of each planet. I think the best of the game is the jugabilty. It's cool 0 gravity!

Our galaxy is now full of trash, and that's because human being polution and the cooperation of the different alien civilizations. Go and get them!

So, the theme of the game jam... There are this little alien friends that will help you succeed in a less complicated way (and you will want to). You will pick them up in the way to the final bosses. So, the more you are, the best it is. Stronger together...
